snippet: A 13-year-old Spanish boy armed with a crossbow and a machete killed a substitute teacher on Monday and wounded four other people at his high school in Barcelona, the police said.
lead_paragraph: A 13-year-old Spanish boy armed with a crossbow and a machete killed a substitute teacher on Monday and wounded four other people at his high school in Barcelona, the police said.

headline.main: Spain: Boy Accused of Killing Teacher
headline.print_headline: Spain: Boy Accused of Killing Teacher
